contentrichtext.text: '''Charlestown''' or '''Charles Town''' may refer to: {{TOCRight}} ==Australia== *[[Charlestown, New South Wales]] ** [[Electoral district of Charlestown]], an electoral district in the New South Wales Legislative Assembly including the area ==Bahamas== *[[Nassau, Bahamas]], formerly Charles Town ==Ireland== *[[Charlestown, County Mayo]] ==Saint Kitts and Nevis== *[[Charlestown, Saint Kitts and Nevis]] ==Saint Vincent and the Grenadines== *[[Charlestown, Canouan]] ==South Africa== *[[Charlestown, KwaZulu-Natal]] ==United Kingdom== *[[Charlestown, Black Isle]], in the Highland council area *[[Charlestown, Cornwall]] *[[Charlestown, Derbyshire]] *[[Charlestown, Dorset]] *[[Charlestown, Fife]] (also known as Charlestown-on-Forth) *[[Charlestown, Greater Manchester]] *[[Charlestown, Wester Ross]], part of Gairloch, in the Highland council area *[[Bannfoot]], [[County Armagh]] (also known as Charlestown) ==United States== *[[Charlestown, Indiana]] *[[Charlestown, Maryland]] *[[Charlestown, Boston]], Massachusetts, a formerly independent city which is now part of Boston *[[Charleston, South Carolina]], called Charles Town from its founding in 1680 until 1783 *[[Charlestown, New Hampshire]] *[[Charlestown, Rhode Island]] **[[Naval Auxiliary Air Station Charlestown]] *[[Charlestown, Wisconsin]] *[[Charles Town, West Virginia]] ==See also== *[[Charleston (disambiguation)]] *[[Charlton (disambiguation)]] *[[Charles Town (disambiguation)]] *[[Charles Towne (disambiguation)]] {{disambig|geo}} [[pl:Charles Town]]
